subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Behind Kevin Durant, Russell Westbrook and a renewed defensive aggressiveness, the Thunder beat the Spurs to put an emphatic end to one of the great winning streaks in N.B.A. history.
snippet: Behind Kevin Durant, Russell Westbrook and a renewed defensive aggressiveness, the Thunder beat the Spurs to put an emphatic end to one of the great winning streaks in N.B.A. history.
